T02D2459:134a-1: pradzny'a tarsha ganbho shi p'a ri ka th'a n'a ma /
T02D2459:134a-3: shes rab brtsams pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba /
T02D2459:134a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2459:134a-5: bde chen 'khor lo zag med spros pa rgyas pa'i sku dang chos //
T02D2459:134a-6: tshogs ba'i zhing dang dngos grub rtsa ba rnams la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2459:134a-7: gal te brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ba'i dus min gyi //
T02D2459:134a-8: yin pa'i rtags dang ldan dus rtag tu bzod med brtsam //
T02D2459:134a-9: slob dpon slob ma tshol ba dang //
T02D2459:134a-10: rin chen rnyed par bsgrub pa dang //
T02D2459:134a-11: slob ma don drin slar 'don dang //
T02D2459:134a-12: dbang bskur med par slar 'dod dang //
T02D2459:134a-13: re ba'i gos kyis 'gro ba dang //
T02D2459:134a-14: lci ba'i zas kyis 'tsho ba dang //
T02D2459:134a-15: mi phyed rnyed sogs rtsod pa dang //
T02D2459:134a-16: drag pos gzhan zil gnon 'dod dang //
T02D2459:134a-17: sku gzugs rtsod pas 'jig pa dang //
T02D2459:134a-18: mig can 'gran zlas rtsod gyur dang ;
T02D2459:134a-19: / dge slong gnas la rtsod pa dang //
T02D2459:134a-20: grub mtha' skur bas sun 'byin dang //
T02D2459:134a-21: 'gro rnams spyod pa lta ba dang //
T02D2459:134a-23: rin chen grags pa 'das pa dang //
T02D2459:134a-24: mi rnams g-yo sgyus 'tsho ba dang //
T02D2459:134a-25: shing rnams g-yab mos g-yab pa dang //
T02D2459:134a-26: ri rnams tshe nges 'debs pa dang //
T02D2459:134a-28: skal ba can la grags min brjod //
T02D2459:134a-29: rtsod rtags nyi shu rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2459:134a-30: bram ze mo yi mar me 'dra //
T02D2459:134a-31: kye lha dang drang srong 'tsho ba'i dus 'das bsam //
T02D2459:134a-32: snying rjes dman pa rjes 'dzin zla 'byung dus //
T02D2459:134b-0: skyabs @134b su 'gro ba dam pa'i rten 'brel na //
T02D2459:134b-1: 'ching ba'i dus tshe sdug bsngal sogs 'byung 'gyur //
T02D2459:134b-2: kye skye ba bzang thob skyes dan bud med kyis //
T02D2459:134b-3: lus dang ngag yid sngom pa mchog gsum la //
T02D2459:134b-4: brtse ldan dmigs med 'brel ba mi gnas pa //
T02D2459:134b-5: dam par 'gyur tshul bral na nges par 'ching//
T02D2459:134b-6: kye dngos grub nye bar rnyed par ma btsal na //
T02D2459:134b-7: rang gi bde chen 'bad sa rtogs mi 'gyur //
T02D2459:134b-8: 'od gsal ma brnyes nyon mongs lam mi 'gyur //
T02D2459:134b-9: ngag dang mi ldan chos nyid rgyas gdab bral //
T02D2459:134b-10: bden pa bral bas nges 'byin rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D2459:134b-11: brtul zhugs brtan te ma byas gsal mi rnyed //
T02D2459:134b-12: sems kyi me la tshe bral bas mchog thob min //
T02D2459:134b-13: dbang po ma yengs skye ba rnal 'byor rnams //
T02D2459:134b-14: 'dod pas ma g-yeng bya ba la mi 'jug /
T02D2459:134b-15: man ngag 'gro la ma g-yengs nyid ma ldog /
T02D2459:134b-16: dam pa'i brgyud pa ma bskam 'bras ma bcad //
T02D2459:134b-18: kye ma rtag tu phyi nang mnyam par blta //
T02D2459:134b-19: dus ni yun thun 'di lam rdzogs na //
T02D2459:134b-20: dus 'gyur ba yis dus rab rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D2459:134b-21: de bas brtson 'grus dus la bab kyis byos //
T02D2459:134b-22: rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bram ze ste //
T02D2459:134b-23: 'dod la rab chags bha bhi ti //
T02D2459:134b-24: ngoms med nyams bral bha lo sha / da ni dus 'das nyi ma 'dra//
T02D2459:134b-25: bdag gis gdams pa 'di bris pas //
T02D2459:134b-26: rim gyis lam la rtsol 'gyur shog / shes rab
T02D2459:134b-27: brtsam pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba bhangga la'i
T02D2459:134b-28: mkhas pa dpal nges par sbyangs pa dpal ldan gnyis
T02D2459:134b-29: su med pa'i rdo rjes bram ze bha lo la
